content: learn how to create this center-out technique with this full tutorial use any weight yarn with a corresponding hook size worsted weight yarn is recommended see website for pattern here https //hearthookhome com/how-to-c2c-crochet-in-rounds-step-by-step/ or buy the pattern from etsy here https //www etsy com/listing/1403142513/how-to-c2c-in-rounds-printable ref=cart
